Artifact creature cards in your hand without dormant have dormant. Their dormant cost is equal to their mana cost reduced by {2}. This effect cannot reduce a cost to less than one mana.
Whenever Diligent Animator deals combat damage to an opponent, choose a noncreature artifact you control with power and toughness. That artifact becomes a creature. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
